title: Crime Alert 06.08.22
itunes:title: Crime Alert 06.08.22
description:
Son arrested after police find dismembered body of mom in dumpster. Speedster says he wasn't trying to elude cops with high speed chase. He was just leading the way. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
